subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Connecticut received 21 points from Jerome Dyson and the Huskies ended a three-game losing streak with a 75-59 win over St. John’s on Wednesday in Hartford.
snippet: Connecticut received 21 points from Jerome Dyson and the Huskies ended a three-game losing streak with a 75-59 win over St. John’s on Wednesday in Hartford.
